description: A renowned name in Milan, this restaurant is the setting for a Mediterranean cuisine  with an international twist. Although recently renovated, the dining room has an attractive old-fashioned feel with old photographs of celebrities who have eaten here since it opened more than 120 years ago.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
